description.value: You wear skulls to demoralize foes. You become trained in Intimidation and gain the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Intimidating Glare]{Intimidating Glare} skill feat. If you're already trained in Intimidation, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. If you pay 50 gp for a @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Splendid Skull Mask]{Splendid Skull Mask}, the mask grants you a +1 item bonus to Intimidation; its usage is worn (mask).
